committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A bill to designate the Donner Trail and the Transcontinental Railroad Trail located in the State of Utah as study trails for potential designation as national historic trails.

summary.text: Amends the National Trails System Act to designate for study for inclusion in such System the Donner Trail, Utah, and the Transcontinental Railroad Trail, Utah.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Donner Trail and the Transcontinental Railroad Trail located in the State of Utah as study trails for potential designation as national historic trails.
